sections.title: From monorepo
sections.text: Workspace packages resolve via Turborepo. Use @ui8kit/core for components.

sections.title: Design tokens
sections.text: Copy shadcn.css or your theme variables. CSS variables power the semantic tokens (primary, secondary, muted, destructive, etc.).

sections.title: Generator
sections.text: Run bun run generate in apps/engine to build React templates. Output goes to dist/react/. Copy to your app or use via CDN registry.
